name: Beaux Daddy's
text:
SOUP
Cream of Tomato - 10 Creamy and tangy tomato soup enriched with herbs and spices.
Lemon Coriander [Gluten Free] - 10 A refreshing clear veg soup with lemon, coriander, carrots and cabbage.
Sweet Corn Shorba [Gluten Free] - 10 Delicate vegetable and sweet corn soup with subtle spice.
Hot N Sour - 10 Savoury and spicy with vegetables and soy sauce.
Manchao - 10/13 Veg / Chicken n Egg soup.
SALADS
Ceasar Salad (Add Chicken $2) - 10 Old fashion, lettuce, cherry tomato parmesan.
Raw Green Salad [Vegan] [Gluten Free] - 10 Mix of cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, and fresh lettuce, carrots, green chilli with lemon wedges.
Chana Chatpata Salad [Vegan] [Gluten Free] - 10 Chickpea, onion, tomato, lemon, fresh coriander and seasoning.
Peanut Masala [Vegan] [Gluten Free] - 10 Peanuts, tomatoes, onions, lemon juice tossed with spices.
Masala Papad - 10 Poppadum sprinkled with onions, tomatoes, lemon juice and spices.
APPETIZERS (NON-VEG)
Chicken Wings (12 pc.) - 20 Chooce your flavour: Peri Peri / Salt & Pepper / BBQ / Honey Chilli Garlic / Bang Bang
Chilly Shrimp [Hot] - 20 Shrimp tossed with peppers, onion and spicy tangy sauce.
Chilly Chicken [Hot] - 20 Boneless chicken tossed with peppers, onion and spicy tangy sauce.
Chicken 65 [Hot] - 20 Chicken toasted with yogurt, spices, curry leaves and herbs.
Bang Bang Chicken [Hot] [Hot] [Hot] - 20 Crisp-tossed Chicken coated in a spicy, tangy blend.
Butter Chicken Croquettes - 20 Loaded with butter chicken sauce served with pickled mayo.
Chicken Manchurian - 20 Fried chicken tossed in tangy manchurian sauce.
Honey Chilli Crisp Chicken [Hot] - 20 Crispy golden chicken tossed in a sweet and tangy honey glaze, finished with a hint of garlic and sesame.
Fish Pakora [Gluten Free] - 22 Fish coated with chickpeas batter and spices.
Lamb Pepper Masala [Hot] - 25 Tender lamb pieces cooked in a fiery black pepper and aromatic spice blend.
APPETIZERS (VEG)
French Fries [Vegan] - 9
Peri Peri Fries [Vegan] - 10
Samosa (2pcs) [Vegan] - 10 Cone shape Indian snack, stuffed with potato, mild spices. Served with mint and tamarind sauce.
Honey Chilli Potato - 17 Crispy fried potato tossed in honey garlic sauce.
Cauliflower Wings [Gluten Free] - 20 Dusted cauliflower tossed in (mild, medium or hot) honey garlic sauce.
Veg Manchurian [Vegan] - 20 Crispy fried vegetables ball tossed in tangy manchurian sauce.
Cheese Corn Lollipop (6pcs) - 20 Crispy fried cheese and corn dumplings served with herb sauce.
Chilly Paneer [Hot] - 20 Cottage cheese with peppers, onion and spicy tangy sauce.
Paneer 65 [Hot] - 20 Cottage cheese tossed with spices and curry leaves.
Bang Bang Paneer [Hot] [Hot] [Hot] - 20 Crisp-tossed cottage cheese coated in a spicy and tangy sauce.
Soya Chilly [Hot] - 20 Soya chaap tossed with peppers, onion and spicy tangy sauce.
CHAAT CORNER
Samosa Chaat - 10 Savory chickpeas with crispy samosa topped with yogurt and chutney.
Dahi Ke Golgappe - 10 Crisp golgappe filled with spices, creamy sweetened yogurt, finished with chutneys.
Papri Chat - 10 Bite size crispy fried cracker loaded with potatoes, yogurt and tamarind sauce.
Aloo Tikki Chaat - 13 Crispy fried potato patties toped with yogurt, chutneys and chaat masala.
Dahi Bhalla [Gluten Free] - 15 Deep fried lentil fritters dunked in creamy yogurt topped with sweet spicy chutneys.
MAIN COURSE
CHICKEN CURRIES
Chettinad Chicken [Gluten Free] [Hot] - 20 South Indian style spiced with whole spices, fresh onions and curry leaves in a thick gravy.
Chicken Tikka Masala [Gluten Free] [Hot] - 20 Chicken cooked in a rich, creamy gravy with aromatic spices, roasted nuts, and a hint of smoky flavor.
Kadai Chicken [Gluten Free] [Hot] - 20 Spiced chicken cooked with peppers, onions, and classic kadai masala.
Chicken Curry (Bone-in) [Gluten Free] [Hot] - 20 Slow-cooked bone-in chicken in a rich, homestyle curry with deep, layered flavours.
Chicken Vindaloo [Gluten Free] [Hot] [Hot] - 20 Tender chicken simmered in a bold, spicy, and tangy curry with vinegar, garlic, and aromatic spices.
Chicken Kolhapuri [Gluten Free] [Hot] [Hot] [Hot] - 20 Chicken slow-cooked in an authentic, robust Kolhapuri masala.
Khaas-e-Aam Chicken Curry [Gluten Free] - 20 Chicken simmered in a rich mango pur√©e with aromatic spices and a hint of sweetness.
Butter Chicken [Gluten Free] - 20 Char Grilled chicken in fresh tomato and cashew gravy enriched with butter, cream and fenugreek.
Chicken Methi Malai [Gluten Free] - 20 Chicken cooked in a cashew creamy gravy with fenugreek leaves and spices.
BEEF CURRIES
Beef Vindaloo [Gluten Free] [Hot] - 25 Flavourful beef cooked with garam masala, cumin, paprika, turmeric, mustard, ground ginger in onion gravy.
LAMB/GOAT CURRIES
Jaipuri Laal Maas [Gluten Free] [Hot] - 25 Slow cooked lamb curry simmered with onions, bay leaf, cinnamon and red chilies.
Mutton Roganjosh [Gluten Free] - 25 Roganjosh stands for aromatic curried meat, traditionally lamb cook and coloured with unique spices.
Saag Gosht [Gluten Free] - 25 Lamb stewed in spice-infused fresh spinach curry.
Goat Curry (Bone-in) [Gluten Free] - 25 Goat stewed in spice-infused fresh onion and tomato curry.
PANEER CURRIES
Paneer Lababdar [Gluten Free] - 20 Mildly spiced cottage cheese tossed with capsicum in tomato and cashew gravy.
Kolhapuri Paneer [Gluten Free] [Hot] - 20 Tender cottage cheese cubes in a rich, fiery Kolhapuri sauce made with aromatic spices, coconut, and Kashmiri chillies.
Palak Paneer [Gluten Free] - 20 Cottage cheese cooked in spice infused fresh spinach gravy.
Adraki Dhaniya Paneer [Gluten Free] - 20 Cottage cheese cubes cooked in a fragrant ginger-coriander gravy, infused with spices.
Cheese Butter Masala [Gluten Free] - 20 Amul cheese cubes simmered in a rich, buttery tomato gravy with a touch of cream and aromatic spices.
Paneer Butter Masala [Gluten Free] - 20 Creamy and rich gravy with cottage cheese cubes, cooked in a buttery tomato-based sauce, with aromatic spices.
Paneer Mutter Methi Malai [Gluten Free] - 20 Cottage cheese and green peas cooked in a creamy gravy with fenugreek leaves & spices.
Paneer Tikka Masala [Gluten Free] - 20 Creamy and rich gravy with cottage cheese marinated with spices, cooked in a buttery tomato-based sauce and aromatic spices.
VEGGIE CURRIES
Veg Makhani [Gluten Free] [Vegan] - 20 Fresh vegetable sauteed with chunky garlic, herbs and tossed in buttery gravy.
Mushroom Matar Masala [Gluten Free] - 20 Mushrooms tossed in a spiced, tangy masala, coated with aromatic herbs.
Palak Chana [Gluten Free] - 20 A wholesome blend of tender chickpeas simmered in a creamy spinach gravy, seasoned with aromatic spices.
Pindi Chhole(Chickpea) [Vegan] [Gluten Free] - 20 White chickpea curry infused with fragrant ginger-garlic, spices and tangy dry mango powder.
Baingan Bharta [Gluten Free] [Vegan] - 20 Smoked eggplant blended with slow cooked tomatoes, caramelized onions, and spices for a rich, rustic mash.
Mix Veg Sangam [Gluten Free] - 20 A medley of fresh vegetables slow-cooked in a silky, aromatic curry for a perfect harmony of flavours.
SIGNATURE DALS
Dal Makhni [Gluten Free] - 19 Black lentils cooked overnight with tomatoes and butter.
Yellow Dal Tadka [Vegan] [Gluten Free] - 19 Yellow lentils cooked with spices tempered with ginger and garlic.
Dal Fry [Gluten Free] - 19 Slow-cooked black lentils enriched with a fragrant ghee tadka of roasted spices.
PAIR ANY MAINS WITH A GARLIC NAAN AND AROMATIC BASMATI RICE FOR $9
SEAFOOD CURRIES
Mapusa Fish Curry [Gluten Free] - 25 Fish curry made with tomato gravy, coconut cream and spices.
Jheenga Jalandhariya [Gluten Free] - 25 Juicy prawns cooked in Punjabi-style gravy, bursting with spices, tomatoes cream.
BURGER/SANDWICH
Uncle's Burger - 20 Ground Beef patty with fresh toppings in house sauce, and melted cheddar cheese.
The Sleeping Giant - 20 Signature beef patty, ham slice, lettuce, tomatoes, caramelised onion and cheddar cheese.
The Superior Burger - 20 Seasoned and pan fried chicken patty with lettuce, tomato, cheddar cheese and pickle mayo.
Veggie Delight Burger - 18 Veggie patty made with potatoes, peas, fresh herbs, and aromatic spices with fresh toppings in house sauce and melted cheddar cheese.
Tandoori Chicken Sandwich - 20 Grilled fresh sliced bread filled with shredded tandoori chicken, spring greens, tomatoes and cheese slice.
All burgers and all sandwiches comes with fries and a side of salads.
SPECIAL SELECTIONS
Pork Ribs - 25 Slow-cooked pork ribs finished with a tangy orange glaze sauce.
Cheese Arancini balls - 20 Crispy charcol coated rice balls filled with melted cheese, served with a side of zesty marinara.
Chole Bhature (Only Sat & Sunday 1pm-5pm) - 18 Fluffy golden fried naan paired with rich, spiced chole(Chickpea). Served with mint sauce, spiced yogurt and raw onions.
TANDOORI TEMPTATION (Traditional clay oven that gives meats and breads a smoky, charred flavor)
Tandoori Chicken [Gluten Free] [Hot] - 25 Roasted chicken in pot clay oven with spicy marination and greens. (3 drumsticks, 1 whole leg)
Paneer Tikka (TANDOORI / AFGANI) [Gluten Free] - 22 Cottage cheese, red onions, peppers roasted with spicy flavour or malai (creamy) flavour.
Afgani Soya Chaap/ Tandoori - 20 Soya marinated in a creamy/spicy blend of aromatic spices, grilled to smoky perfection.
Lahori Chicken Tikka (TANDOORI / AFGANI) [Gluten Free] - 20 Boneless Chicken, red onions, peppers roasted with spicy flavour or malai (creamy) flavour.
Tandoori Fish Tikka [Gluten Free] - 23 Clay oven baked fish with spicy marination and served with mint sauce.
IN HOUSE BIRYANI'S
Tawa Lamb [Gluten Free] - 25 Rice cooked with lamb meat and spices served with raita and papad.
Goat (Bone-in) [Gluten Free] - 25 Rice cooked with goat meat and spices and served with raita and papad.
Chicken Dum (Bone-in) [Gluten Free] [Hot] - 21 A fragrant rice dish made with chicken, aromatic spices and saffron all slow-cooked to perfection.
Veg [Gluten Free] - 20 A fragrant rice dish made with mixed vegetables, aromatic spices and saffron all slow-cooked to perfection.
RICE
Plain - 8 Fluffy, fragrant long-grain rice steamed to perfection.
Jeera (Cumin) - 9 Aromatic basmati rice tempered with roasted cumin seeds and finished with fresh coriander.
BREADS
Roti(Plain/Butter) - 4 Whole wheat roti brushed with melted butter.
Butter/Plain Naan - 5 Fluffy tandoor-baked naan finished with a generous coating of butter.
Bullet Naan [Hot] - 6 Soft tandoori naan topped with fresh coriander and finely chopped raw green chillies.
Chilli Olive Naan - 6 Freshly baked naan layered with green chillies and black olives for a savoury, spicy bite.
Garlic Naan - 6 Soft tandoori naan topped with fresh garlic.
Cheese Naan - 10 Tandoori naan stuffed with melted cheese.
RAITA
Plain - 4 Refreshing chilled yogurt lightly seasoned with cumin and herbs.
Mix Veg - 6 Refreshing chilled yogurt blended with coriander, onions, tomatoes, and mild spices.
DESSERTS
Rabri Mousse - 10 Slow-cooked milk, sweetened and flavoured with cardamom, saffron, and nuts.
Mango Mousse - 10 Light, airy mousse bursting with the sweetness of ripe mangoes.
Gulab Jamun with Ice Cream - 10 Warm, soft milk dumplings soaked in fragrant syrup, served alongside creamy vanilla ice cream. (4pcs) & (1 scoop).
Baked Gulab Jamun - 10 Caramelised baked gulab jamun topped with creamy rabri for a smokey finish.
Gajar Ka Halwa - 10 Slow-cooked grated carrots simmered in milk, ghee, and sugar, flavoured with cardamom and garnished with nuts.
Belgium Chocolate Brownie - 10 Rich, fudgy brownie made with premium Belgian chocolate topped with vanilla ice cream.
